content: The goddess Natural Selection blindly and unconsciously, but amazingly creatively, chooses random mutations produced at long intervals by the god Chance.
translations: ita:La dea Selezione Naturale sceglie ciecamente e inconsciamente, ma in modo sorprendentemente creativo, mutazioni casuali
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
